TopicTitle: Mod that manages other mod parts

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone.

I remember that few years ago there was a mod featured on Daily Kerbal that allows you to start with all parts unloaded in editor so you can mark only parts what you are need to load.

Unfortunately I can't find this mod using google - search by "mod to manage parts inventory" or "mod to load only some parts" doesn't help (I saw few slightly similar mods like Scrap Yard, but they add gameplay feature while I just need game not load all parts from 40 mods installed).

Many be anyone here still uses this mod or remember that I'm talking about?

Janitor's Closet allows you to select which parts you want to show in the editor by hiding parts from selected mods.  You can also permanent prune parts so that they no longer load on subsequent startups.

10 hours ago, overkill13 said:

Janitor's Closet allows you to select which parts you want to show in the editor by hiding parts from selected mods.  You can also permanent prune parts so that they no longer load on subsequent startups.

Thank you!
